Package camp

Interface IGeneratePerformanceReport

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    StaffPerformanceReportGenerator
    public interface IGeneratePerformanceReport
    Represents an interface to generate a performance report of the camp committee members of the camps that the staff is in charge of.
    Since:
    2023-11-17
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Soo Qi Yang, Teo Kai Xuan, Masagca Merwyn Louie Dumasis, Nguyen Phuong Linh, Tee Jeeng Yee

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void generatePerformanceReport​(DataList dataList, User user, ISortCamps iSortCamps, IFilterCamps iFilterCamps, String filterString)
      Represents an interface that creates a performance report in a text file.

    • Method Detail

      • generatePerformanceReport

        void generatePerformanceReport​(DataList dataList,
                               User user,
                               ISortCamps iSortCamps,
                               IFilterCamps iFilterCamps,
                               String filterString)
        Represents an interface that creates a performance report in a text file. The implementor is responsible for asking for the file name, and utilise the sorting and filtering interfaces together with the filterString to sort and filter the camps in it's associated camp database first, to find the suitable camps that need to be output in the report.
        Parameters:
        dataList - A User Data base object to obtain the user's points from.
        user - The user who wants to generate a report.
        iSortCamps - The user's sorting preferences.
        iFilterCamps - The user's filter-by category preferences.
        filterString - The exact string/values that the user wants to filter the category by.
